item.title: Eye OT inaugurated at Gadwal Govt General Hospital
item.description:
<![CDATA[An Ophthalmic (eye) operation theatre (OT) at Government General Hospital in Gadwal was inaugurated by the local MLA Bandla Kirshnamohan Reddy along with the district collector B.M. Santosh on Sunday (December 15, 2024). The collector said that people can avail the medical service here, and save on time and money put into traveling to other places. The hospital superintendent Vinod Kumar and the hospital staff were present on the occasion.
Related Topics Telangana...]]>
